StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCollegePro.leList]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ZipCodes xml =null, @FiscalYear int
AS
BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
IF @ZipCodes IS NOT null BEGIN DECLARE @ZipCodesTable TABLE (ID varchar(5)) INSERT INTO @ZipCodesTable (ID) SELECT ParamValues.ID.value('.','VARCHAR(5)') FROM @ZipCodes.nodes('ZipCodes/id') as ParamValues(ID) END
SELECT hsp.ROWGUID, hs.SCHOOL_CODE, HIGHSCHOOL_NAME , school_type FROM HIGH_SCHOOL hs inner join dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PROFILE hsp on hsp.school_code = hs.school_code WHERE ( @ZipCodes is null OR LEFT(ZIP_CODE,5) IN (SELECT * FROM @ZipCodesTable) ) AND hsp.school_year = @FiscalYear AND hs.DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY HIGHSCHOOL_NAME
END
